:v-model.description: The current progress percentage, in array format in double-slider mode
:v-model.description_zh: 当前进度百分比，在双滑块模式下为数组格式

bar-height.description: The height of the progress bar, the default unit is px
bar-height.description_zh: 进度条高度，默认单位为 px

button-size.description: The size of the slider button, the default unit is px
button-size.description_zh: 滑块按钮大小，默认单位为 px

active-color.description: The color of the progress bar activation

inactive-color.description: The progress bar is inactive color

range.description: Whether to enable the dual slider mode

reverse.description: Whether to invert the progress bar

readonly.description: Whether it is in the read-only state, and the value of the slider cannot be modified in the read-only state
readonly.description_zh: 是否为只读状态，只读状态下无法修改滑块的值

events.name: update:model-value
events.description: Triggered in real-time when progress changes

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the progress changes and the drag ends
events.description_zh: 进度变化且结束拖动后触发

slots.name: left-button
slots.description: Customize the left slider button (in dual slider mode)
slots.description_zh: 自定义左侧滑块按钮（双滑块模式下）

slots.name: right-button
slots.description: Customize the right slider button (in dual slider mode)
slots.description_zh: 自定义右侧滑块按钮（双滑块模式下）
